thread.section_title: Dallas Cowboys | Official Site of the Dallas Cowboys
thread.title: Player's Lounge: Alright at O-Line?

title: Player's Lounge: Alright at O-Line?
text: Video - Player's Lounge Player's Lounge: Alright at O-Line? The guys discuss if the Cowboys have a championship-level defense, if they would start or sit Tyron Smith this week, and more news and notes. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-alright-at-o-line) Player's Lounge: Alright at O-Line? The guys discuss if the Cowboys have a championship-level defense, if they would start or sit Tyron Smith this week, and more news and notes. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-bring-in-the-mercenaries) Player's Lounge: Bring In the Mercenaries The guys discuss the possibility of bringing in Dalvin Cook in addition to the signings of La'el Collins and Damien Wilson, and if Dak Prescott or Mike McCarthy are on the hot seat going into the playoffs. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-handle-business) Player's Lounge: Handle Business The guys discuss Dak's stats this season and how he'll fare in MVP voting, how Mike McCarthy's previous QBs compare, and preview the Washington Commanders. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-we-ll-take-it) Player's Lounge: We'll Take It The guys recap the Cowboys/Lions game and its dramatic finish, questions at defense going forward, and today's workouts/visits from former Cowboys players La'el Collins and Damien Wilson. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-working-magic) Player's Lounge: Working Magic The guys discuss Jimmy Johnson's upcoming Ring of Honor induction, grading Mike McCarthy on his 2023 campaign, and preview the salary cap questions the Cowboys will have to answer at the end of the season. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-it-s-a-coin-toss) Player's Lounge: It's A Coin Toss The guys discuss roster moves heading into Week 17, how the Detroit Lions matchup against the Cowboys, and more. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-a-tale-of-two-teams) Player's Lounge: A Tale of Two Teams On the road vs. at home, the boys discuss the bi-polar nature of the Cowboys this season, if they can sustain wins without a "dangerous" running game, missed holding calls, and how to feel heading into a critical home game against the Detroit Lions. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-visualize) Player's Lounge: Visualize! Hek'ma hosts a whole new crew including Nate Newton, Jesse Holley, and Kyle Youmans on a special edition of the Player's Lounge. They discuss the game plan heading into Miami, depth at offensive line, and make their picks for this crucial Week 16 matchup. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-road-rage) Player's Lounge: Road Rage The guys discuss playoff scenarios at the No. 2 seed, if they trust the Cowboys on the road going forward, and recap Coach McCarthy's Thursday press conference. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-the-miami-rundown) Player's Lounge: The Miami Rundown The guys discuss if the Cowboys can "fix" the run defense in a week, players across the league responding to criticism on social media, and more on the Dolphins as Dallas prepares for this Week 16 matchup. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-finding-joy-in-philly-s-follies) Player's Lounge: Finding Joy in Philly's Follies The guys discuss the Eagles falling to the Seahawks in Seattle, what it means for the Cowboys going forward, and begin to take a look at the Dolphins' daunting offensive attack. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-bullied-or-undisciplined) Player's Lounge: Bullied or Undisciplined? The guys discuss the disappointing 31-10 loss to the Buffalo Bills, if the Cowboys' defense is capable of stopping the run in the future, and more. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-the-big-problem) Player's Lounge: The Big Problem The guys discuss how the Cowboys can hold up against Josh Allen and the Buffalo Bills, take a look at the power rankings, and make their picks for Week 15. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-aubrey-automatic) Player's Lounge: Aubrey Automatic The guys discuss Brandon "Butter" Aubrey's streak heading into Buffalo, limiting Josh Allen, capitalizing on turnovers, and how many Cowboys will make the NFL Pro Bowl. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-in-dan-quinn-we-trust) Player's Lounge: In Dan Quinn We Trust The guys discuss a convincing 33-13 win over the Philadelphia Eagles on SNF, highlight the defense performance, and bring you more news and notes from around the league. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-proving-ground) Player's Lounge: Proving Ground The guys discuss which side of the ball gives you the biggest impact against the Eagles, if this is a "prove it" game for Dak Prescott, and make their Week 14 picks. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-full-go) Player's Lounge: Full Go The guys discuss updates from coach and player availability this Thursday, the Cowboys and Eagles injury reports, and other news from around the league. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-no-excuses) Player's Lounge: No Excuses The guys discuss Mike McCarthy's emergency surgery, how it impacts the team on Sunday against the Eagles, and if this is a better Cowboys team than the last time they were in Philadelphia. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-shutting-down-the-philly-run) Player's Lounge: Shutting Down the Philly Run The guys preview the Eagles offense against the Dallas defense, how the Cowboys need to limit their playmaking ability, and more news and notes. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-losing-out-on-leonard) Player's Lounge: Losing Out On Leonard? The guys discuss Shaq Leonard signing a one-year deal with the Philadelphia Eagles, how it impacts the Cowboys going into the week 14 matchup, and more news from around the league. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-got-it-done) Player's Lounge: Got it Done The guys discuss the 41-35 win over the Seattle Seahawks on TNF, if the defense is still the strength of this team, and make their remaining picks for Week 13. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-can-t-overlook-seattle) Player's Lounge: Can't Overlook Seattle The guys discuss how this defense will hold up against one of the best QBs on the schedule. make their predictions for the game, and if the Cowboys are already looking at the Eagles. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-lunch-is-for-closers) Player's Lounge: Lunch is For Closers The guys discuss Darius Leonard visiting The Star today and meeting with Jerry Jones, how the Cowboys will be matching up against the Seattle Seahawks, if the 49ers can do us a favor this weekend. [ video ](/video/player-s-lounge-the-good-and-the-bland) Player's Lounge: The Good and the Bland The guys discuss news and coaching updates from around the league, DaRon Bland's play, and more.
